## Course Objectives:
![[Pasted image 20231024094625.png]]


## ILT Session Plan and Activities: Day 1

Session # | Session | SonicWall Labs
:--| :-- | :--
Session 0 | Course Introduction | Program Overview and Reference Architecture
Session I | Setting up Basic Firewall Components | Firewall registration, Zones; Virtual Interfaces; Host Address and Service Objects; NAT Policies; Access Rules; Bandwidth Management
Session 2 | Unified Threat Management | Basic Threat Protection (GAV, IPS, Anti-Spyware); Advanced Threat Protection (Capture ATP, GEO-IP, Botnet Filtering)
Session 3 | Secure Access | IPSec Site-to-Site VPN; Route-based VPN; Client SSL-VPN, and Virtual Office with LDAP authentication
